price: 51. Waxaan si xidhiidhsan (oo qayb qayb ah) u soo gaarsiinnay Qowlka (Qur’aanka), inay xusuustaan (oo waantoobaan).
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad waṣṣalnā lahumu al-qawla laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
